## CommandTranslation

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/i18n/src/types.ts" sourceLine="41" packageName="@commandkit/i18n" />

Represents a command translation, including its metadata and translations.

```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandTranslation {
    [COMMAND_METADATA_KEY]: CommandTranslationMetadata;
    [USER_CTX_COMMAND_METADATA_KEY]: BasicCommandTranslationMetadata;
    [MESSAGE_CTX_COMMAND_METADATA_KEY]: BasicCommandTranslationMetadata;
    translations: Record<string, any>;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### \[COMMAND_METADATA_KEY]

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/i18n/interfaces/command-translation-metadata#commandtranslationmetadata'>CommandTranslationMetadata</a>`}   />

The metadata for the command translation.
### \[USER_CTX_COMMAND_METADATA_KEY]

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/i18n/interfaces/basic-command-translation-metadata#basiccommandtranslationmetadata'>BasicCommandTranslationMetadata</a>`}   />

The metadata for the user context menu command translation.
### \[MESSAGE_CTX_COMMAND_METADATA_KEY]

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/i18n/interfaces/basic-command-translation-metadata#basiccommandtranslationmetadata'>BasicCommandTranslationMetadata</a>`}   />

The metadata for the message context menu command translation.
### translations

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Record&#60;string, any&#62;`}   />

The translations for the command, keyed by locale.
